label: AB4CD_oP28_33_a_4a_a_a-001
title: $\delta$$_{1}$-LiZnPO$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
LiZnPO$_{4}$ has been observed in a variety of structures. We list those which have know crystal structures: \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4CD_mC224_9_8a_32a_8a_8a-001}{$\alpha$-LiZnPO$_{4}$} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4CD_oP28_33_a_4a_a_a-001}{$\delta_{1}$-LiZnPO$_{4}$}, (this structure) and \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4CD_hR42_146_2b_8b_2b_2b-001}{rhombohedral LiZnPO$_{4}$}. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 (Jensen, 1995) find that the lithium site is 8\\% zinc and the zinc site is 8\\% lithium. They were apparently unaware of the work of (Harrison, 1995) (ICSD 79352), who reported a similar, albeit ordered, structure several months earlier. 
 (Villars, 2012) refers to this structure as $\delta_{1}$-LiZnPO$_{4}$. 
 Space group $Pna2_{1}$ \#33 allows an arbitrary choice of the origin of the $z$-coordinates.  We fix it by putting the zinc atom at $z_{7} = 0$.
